text: Ixora lawsonii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Karnataka and Kerala in India. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Ixora lawsonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae lawsonii Category:Flora of Karnataka Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora lawsonii
